items.title: Lexar’s Switch 2-compatible 900MB/s PLAY PRO Express microSD cards start from just $50 for fall Prime Day
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Prime Big Deals Day sale, Amazon is offering some notable discounts on Lexar’s Switch 2-compatible Express microSD cards. You can snag the brand’s 256GB PLAY PRO Express microSD for $49.88 shipped. That’s down from its usual price of $60, so you’re looking at a 17% markdown right now. The 512GB and 1TB variants of this memory card are also discounted to $99.88 and $186.88 shipped, respectively. While the savings aren’t huge at the moment compared to other deals, it’s a rare chance to grab these memory cards in stock and discounted as well at up to 17% off. They’re likely to sell out quickly, so grab them while you can after getting more details below.

Down below you’ll find some of our favorite price drop now live for Prime Big Deal days, gear we might have to pull our own credit cards out for, and some you might want to have on your radar while the price is right. AirPods back at the best prices ever, the lowest prices yet on the latest Google Pixel devices, the official Anker Prime Day sale, a wild discount on the latest Beats Pill, some of the most value-packed e-bikes, and that’s just for starters, get a closer look below.

items.title: Refresh countertops with 6-in-1 versatility + pastel colors using Our Place’s Wonder Oven at $155 for Prime Day (Reg. $185), more
items.summary:
As part of Amazon’s Prime Big Deal Days event, the Our Place official storefront is offering its Wonder Oven down at $155 shipped in all four colorways. Normally running you $185 these days at full price, discounts are often regularly spaced out between months, with things having gone as low as $140 in the past, which was the July Prime Day rate we haven’t seen since. Today’s deal isn’t going so low, but you’re still saving a solid $30 off the going rate, which lands the costs just $15 above the all-time low. We’ve also collected some of the brand’s best cookware Prime deals below.

items.summary:
We are tracking hundreds of notable discounts on smart TVs for the October Prime Day festivities. However, this collection of deals includes offers from all of the major retailers, including the fall Walmart Deals sale that is now in full swing, Best Buy’s Techtober event, and the official Amazon Prime Big Deal Days. Following the top section you’ll find below that has some more affordable Doorbuster-worthy deals and particular highlights on top name brands, you’ll find a sizable collection of deep discounts on 2025 smart TV releases from the most popular brands – LG, Samsung, Hisense, TCL, Amazon, and more. Dive in for a closer look at the best deal on smart TVs now live for the big fall sale season down below.

items.summary:
MoKo Wireless CarPlay Adapter

Buy for $25 (Reg. $37)

Clip the on-page $10 off coupon. Prime-exclusive discount.

What we love

When I bought my car back in 2021, it had wired CarPlay. A year or two later, the manufacturer rolled out an update that gave me wireless CarPlay for free. It’s been wonderful to not have to fiddle with cables each time I get in the car. If you have wired CarPlay, this dongle can help you upgrade to a wireless setup for just $25.

While we aren’t necessarily expecting any price drops on the all-new next-generation Echo speakers and displays, Ring and Blink smart cams, or the new Kindle Scribe Colorsoft, there are plenty of big-time discounts now live across the rest of the Echo smart speakers, Fire Tablets, Fire TV Sticks, Kindles, and more. items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Prime Big Deal Days, Amazon is offering up to 42% discounts on a collection of vacuums, purifying heater/fans, and styling devices. A popular favorite amongst the bunch is the Dyson V8 Plus Cordless Vacuum that has dropped down to $299.99 shipped during this sale. Normally going for $470 at full price, discounts over the year have mostly kept the price down at $350, with one fall to $330 in March and one previous drop lower to this same rate back during July’s similar sales event. That rate is coming back around for the second time in 2025, giving you $170 off the MSRP and dropping things back to the best price we’ve tracked this year. Head below to browse through the other deals from this brand.
